item.title: Backhaul is Backing Things Up
item.description:
While it may seem like the world operates solely on wireless connections, especially if you rely on cell phones and mobile internet, this is only true for the link between your device and the nearest cell tower or access point. Beyond that point lies the backhaul, a crucial but often overlooked component that bridges the wireless and wired worlds. As wireless connections become faster, the limitations of traditional backhaul solutions are becoming increasingly apparent...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/backhaul-is-backing-things-up/
